channel.title: Client Run Error
channel.description:
Ello.
I sended my friend this client, but he gets an error something like this... [code]exception in thread main java.lang.unsupportedclassversionerror[/code] It works for everybody else tho. I installed jdk and set up his variables but it wont work. Please anyone help me. :rolleyes:
EDIT: SORRY WRONG SECTION. PLEASE MOVE THIS THREAD

item.title: Client Run Error
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I’m guessing you compiled with JDK7? If so, that means your friend has a version below JDK7, such as JDK6. I highly recommend that you download JDK6 and compile with that because there are some problems with the versions cooperating with each other. This worked for me, so I assume it will work for anyone - goodluck!

Read full topic
